mdRecord.dcterms:creator: East, Grace Marie [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reference to Roger Goodell, NFL Commissioner, and to the killing of the gorilla Harambe at the Cincinnati Zoo in 2016. A doodle. Expressions of sadness. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Roger Godell did Harambe | I'M DEAD | we're all just drops in the bucket | Time is a flat circle | RIP Harambe |
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Goodell, Roger, 1959-
Gorilla
Sadness
Doodles
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
